title: Reporting threats of physical violence and waiting for mod action

replies.body:
You make another post like this, Imma bop you. Right in the nose.

I have both threatened you and responded to you. The game is afoot! 


###### I am sorry it takes us unreasonably long periods of time to respond at night.

"come here young man I am going to bop you one"

Old Family Guy Episode lol.
